materials: 指定閱讀資料。Papers, reports, etc.
consultation: 1. Office Hours: Thur. from 1030~5 in Rm.505, Integrated Complex Building2. Email: tclin@ntut.edu.tw3. Other information about this course will be released through NTUT i-school     plus or Zuvio.
